authorization

Class AuthorizationControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • authorization.AuthorizationControl

  • public class AuthorizationControl
extends java.lang.Object
    The AuthorizationControl class manages user authentication, authorization, and session control. It handles user login, logout, and role-based access control by maintaining active user sessions and verifying user credentials.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AuthorizationControl()
      Constructs an AuthorizationControl instance, initializing user maps and active session tracking.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Authorizes a user based on their role.

      Creates a session for the given user.
      static java.lang.String getCurrentUserId()
      Gets the current user ID of the active session.
      void loadCredentialsFromStaff(InitialDataStaff initialData, InitialDataPatient initialDataPatient)
      Loads user credentials from initial data sources for staff and patients.
      Users login(java.lang.String userID, java.lang.String password)
      Logs in a user by validating their credentials.
      void logout(java.lang.String userID)
      Logs out a user, ending their active session.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuthorizationControl

        public AuthorizationControl()
        Constructs an AuthorizationControl instance, initializing user maps and active session tracking.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public Users login(java.lang.String userID,
                   java.lang.String password)
        Logs in a user by validating their credentials.
        Parameters:
        userID - The user ID of the user attempting to log in.
        password - The password provided by the user.
        Returns:
        The Users object representing the logged-in user, or null if authentication fails.

      • createSession

        public void createSession(Users user)
        Creates a session for the given user.
        Parameters:
        user - The Users object representing the user to create a session for.

      • logout

        public void logout(java.lang.String userID)
        Logs out a user, ending their active session.
        Parameters:
        userID - The user ID of the user to log out.

      • authorize

        public boolean authorize(java.lang.String userID,
                         java.lang.String expectedRole)
        Authorizes a user based on their role.
        Parameters:
        userID - The user ID of the user to authorize.
        expectedRole - The role expected for the user.
        Returns:
        true if the user has the expected role and is logged in; false otherwise.

      • loadCredentialsFromStaff

        public void loadCredentialsFromStaff(InitialDataStaff initialData,
                                     InitialDataPatient initialDataPatient)
        Loads user credentials from initial data sources for staff and patients.
        Parameters:
        initialData - The InitialDataStaff object containing staff data.
        initialDataPatient - The InitialDataPatient object containing patient data.

      • getCurrentUserId

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentUserId()
        Gets the current user ID of the active session.
        Returns:
        The user ID of the current user, or null if no user is logged in.
